work.title: frontend developer
duties: Work closely with software engineers and designers to contribute HTML, CSS, and JS code to an existing codebase by creating web applications using the data visualization library D3JS.
Communicate with the designers who specialize in designing dynamic web content to help them better understand the dynamic data we handle and how to best represent them.

Create internal tools for the Creative team such as a metrics dashboard to help the team leaders better see the metrics for designers using data from Google Slides and using Google Apps Script to host the tool.
Contribute to new products such as Websites by helping designers better understand the fundamentals of CSS class names and HTML structuring.
